name: SINGLE ULTIMATE BODY APPLICATOR
description:
Want to try a single body wrap to see results in 45 minutes? Click "BACK TO SITE" to contact me under "MY STORY" to order one directly. We only accept checks currently & orders are sent once payment has processed. Or you can order a full box (4 applicators) for $59 at Loyal Customer price. Visit our official site for BEFORE/AFTER pictures as well. Click 'BACK TO SITE."

Expect "ultimate" results with this amazing 45-minute body Applicator! The Ultimate Body Applicator is a non-woven cloth wrap that has been infused with a powerful, botanically-based formula to deliver maximum tightening, toning, and firming results where applied to the skin.

Tightens, tones, & firms 
Minimizes cellulite appearance 
Improves skin texture & tightness 
Mess-free and simple to use 
Results in as little as 45 minutes 
Progressive results over 72 hours 
Made with natural ingredients 
Includes 1 Applicator

Directions: Apply one Applicator to one area of your choice (such as the abdomen, back, sides, legs, arms, or buttocks) and leave on for 45 minutes. Remove and discard. Repeat after 72 hours.

Made with natural ingredients.

The $30 reflects the single wrap trial price.

name: FACIAL APPLICATOR
description:
Sorry, we are CURRENTLY SOLD OUT, but click the link at the top that says BACK TO SITE to visit our official site to order.

The exclusive 45-minute Facial Applicator from It Works! uses a cream-infused cloth wrap to deliver intensive revitalizing benefits to the face that dramatically rejuvenate the skin and minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles in just 45 minutes. Skin looks and feels softer, smoother, and revitalized with a healthy glow. Continuously hydrates for fresher, more luminous skin and a younger-looking you.

Deep hydration, botanically based mask
Produces a lifting effect
Firms and invigorates skin
Softens fine lines & wrinkles
Results in as little as 45 minutes
Includes 4 Applicators.

The $49 reflects the Loyal Customer savings price!

name: DEFINING GEL
description: Sorry, we are CURRENTLY SOLD OUT, but click the link at the top that says BACK TO SITE to visit our official site to order. Luxurious hydration meets contouring results with this favorite It Works! product. Defining Gel is an intensive skin care gel that deeply hydrates while firming areas such as the abdomen, back, legs, and upper arms. When used regularly, Defining Gel minimizes the appearance of cellulite and varicose veins. It's the perfect companion to our Ultimate Body Applicator. Minimizes cellulite appearance Diminishes appearance of varicose veins Improves skin texture & tightness Softens and hydrates Made with natural ingredients Directions: Use Defining Gel twice a day to hydrate, soften, tone, and firm all over. Apply to targeted areas with circular massage until completely absorbed. Extra massaging will assist in maximizing results. Made with natural ingredients. The $49 reflects the Loyal Customer savings price!
